text: Chavanod is a commune in the Haute-Savoie department and Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region of eastern France. It is part of the urban area of Annecy.Unité urbaine d'Annecy (74601), INSEE ==Geography== The river Fier forms parts of the commune's northern border. ==See also== *Communes of the Haute-Savoie department ==References== ==External links== *Gazetteer Entry Category:Communes of Haute-Savoie
title: Chavanod
